trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_SEQ_00<tab>Hirase is impressed by your industrious nature.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_00<tab>Take the rotting fish.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_01<tab>Use the rotting fish to lure out aggressive sharks and slay them.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_02<tab>Search for the industrious pirate.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_03<tab>Rescue the industrious pirate.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_04<tab>Report to Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Rasho.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_030<tab>You've been busy, haven't you? And now you're here to ask if I need help with anything? Heh, now that you mention it...

TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_031<tab>Lately we've had trouble with ravenous sharks that've been leaping out of the water and making off with our fish. Damndest thing, I know, but you wouldn't doubt it if you saw it.

TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_032<tab>We've got to cull the thieving bastards regularly─so happens I sent three of my mates out there before you came along. Still, the more the merrier. If you can kill two or so, that ought to be enough.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_033<tab>Take a few of those rotting fish as bait. I'll not be needing them. Oh, and maybe see if you can't find the other group. They've been away longer than I like.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_HIRASE_000_035<tab>To be honest, I'm more worried about my mates than the sharks at this point. They should've come back by now...
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_BALLOON_000_040<tab>Away with you!
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_POP_MESSAGE<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_050<tab>Oh, kami be praised! I don't know what I would've done if you hadn't come along.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_051<tab>My partners and I got separated when we fled. You haven't seen them, have you?
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_052<tab>Damn... Before the Kojin started chasing us, their leader asked us if we were Doman...
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_PIRATE02481_000_053<tab>They're Yotsuyu's catchers, I know it! First Isari, and now this! I've got to tell Rasho and the others!
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_060<tab>We've been keeping busy. How about─ Oh no, you've got that look. What happened now?
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>Ah, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I heard you went shark hunting?

TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>We too did our fair share of beast culling─though I think Lyse made a stronger impression when she bested a drunken pirate in a sparring match. Fastest knockout to date, I am told.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>I should like to think we have proven ourselves to be rather─ Hm. Why do I get the feeling you have something important to tell me?
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>Kojin mercenaries rounding up Doman Confederates? Surely Yotsuyu has crossed the line now...
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>We must go and speak with Rasho immediately. Even he cannot deny that this changes everything.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>At least, I should like to think that he cannot...
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_LYSE_000_080<tab>What is Yotsuyu thinking, kidnapping Confederates? She has to know they won't take this lying down.
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>We need to speak with Rasho immediately!
TEXT_STMBDA305_02481_TANSUI_000_090<tab>...Let's get this over with, shall we?
